comments.author: Felix Meschberger
comments.body: Proposed patch, which also includes making use of SLF4Js log call optimization for not concatenating strings if not needed.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Looks good. Commit it soon and I'll get this included in 1.5. :-)

comments.author: Felix Meschberger
comments.body: Applied patch to 1.5 branch in Rev. 704863 and to trunk in Rev. 704864.

description:
On each cluster record update, an info message is logged.

I think this is too much and logging should be reduced to the DEBUG level.
